name: The Guts of The City – Ep I
name_original: The Guts of The City – Ep I
description:
An atmospheric horror point 'n click

I put a lot of effort in this game! If you like it and want the series to continue: For the development of Episode II I am seeking funds through crowdfunding. If you want to help, click on the Indiegogo link below. No donation is too small. I could really use your help, and I appreciate any support you can offer. Thank you!

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/the-guts-of-the-city#/

Game Features

- Become a part of an atmospheric dystopian world!
- Make tough moral decisions!
- Explore a hostile city full of mysteries!
- Play as a beggar kid and make it through the day!
- Discover multiple endings!
- Solve riddles and follow creepy rumors!
- Enjoy this arty horror adventure!

Thanks for playing!
